  25. class CalendariumRedirectView(RedirectView):
  26. """View to redirect to the current month view."""
  27. def get_redirect_url(self, **kwargs):
  28. return reverse('calendar_month', kwargs={'year': now().year,
  29. 'month': now().month})
  32. class MonthView(TemplateView):
  33. """View to return all occurrences of an event for a whole month."""
  34. template_name = 'calendarium/calendar_month.html'
  36. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  37. self.month = int(kwargs.get('month'))
  38. self.year = int(kwargs.get('year'))
  39. if self.month not in range(1, 13):
  40. raise Http404
  41. if request.method == 'POST':
  42. if request.POST.get('next'):
  43. new_date = datetime(self.year, self.month, 1) + timedelta(
  44. days=31)
  45. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_month', kwargs={
  46. 'year': new_date.year, 'month': new_date.month}))
  47. elif request.POST.get('previous'):
  48. new_date = datetime(self.year, self.month, 1) - timedelta(
  49. days=1)
  50. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_month', kwargs={
  51. 'year': new_date.year, 'month': new_date.month}))
  52. elif request.POST.get('today'):
  53. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_month', kwargs={
  54. 'year': now().year, 'month': now().month}))
  55. if request.is_ajax():
  56. self.template_name = 'calendarium/partials/calendar_month.html'
  57. return super(MonthView, self).dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
  59. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  60. month = [[]]
  61. week = 0
  62. for day in calendar.Calendar().itermonthdays(self.year, self.month):
  63. current = False
  64. if day:
  65. date = datetime(year=self.year, month=self.month, day=day,
  66. tzinfo=utc)
  67. occurrences = Event.objects.get_occurrences(date, date)
  68. if date.date() == now().date():
  69. current = True
  70. else:
  71. occurrences = []
  72. month[week].append((day, occurrences, current))
  73. if len(month[week]) == 7:
  74. month.append([])
  75. week += 1
  76. ctx = {'month': month, 'date': date}
  77. return ctx
  80. class WeekView(TemplateView):
  81. """View to return all occurrences of an event for one week."""
  82. template_name = 'calendarium/calendar_week.html'
  84. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  85. self.week = int(kwargs.get('week'))
  86. self.year = int(kwargs.get('year'))
  87. if self.week not in range(1, 53):
  88. raise Http404
  89. if request.method == 'POST':
  90. if request.POST.get('next'):
  91. date = monday_of_week(self.year, self.week) + timedelta(days=7)
  92. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_week', kwargs={
  93. 'year': date.year, 'week': date.date().isocalendar()[1]}))
  94. elif request.POST.get('previous'):
  95. date = monday_of_week(self.year, self.week) - timedelta(days=7)
  96. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_week', kwargs={
  97. 'year': date.year, 'week': date.date().isocalendar()[1]}))
  98. elif request.POST.get('today'):
  99. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_week', kwargs={
  100. 'year': now().year,
  101. 'week': now().date().isocalendar()[1]}))
  102. if request.is_ajax():
  103. self.template_name = 'calendarium/partials/calendar_week.html'
  104. return super(WeekView, self).dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
  106. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  107. date = monday_of_week(self.year, self.week)
  108. week = []
  109. day = 0
  110. while day < 7:
  111. current = False
  112. occurrences = Event.objects.get_occurrences(date, date)
  113. if date.date() == now().date():
  114. current = True
  115. week.append((date, occurrences, current))
  116. day += 1
  117. date = date + timedelta(days=1)
  118. ctx = {'week': week, 'date': date, 'week_nr': self.week}
  119. return ctx
  122. class DayView(TemplateView):
  123. """View to return all occurrences of an event for one day."""
  124. template_name = 'calendarium/calendar_day.html'
  126. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  127. self.day = int(kwargs.get('day'))
  128. self.month = int(kwargs.get('month'))
  129. self.year = int(kwargs.get('year'))
  130. try:
  131. self.date = datetime(year=self.year, month=self.month,
  132. day=self.day, tzinfo=utc)
  133. except ValueError:
  134. raise Http404
  135. if request.method == 'POST':
  136. if request.POST.get('next'):
  137. date = self.date + timedelta(days=1)
  138. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_day', kwargs={
  139. 'year': date.year, 'month': date.month, 'day': date.day}))
  140. elif request.POST.get('previous'):
  141. date = self.date - timedelta(days=1)
  142. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_day', kwargs={
  143. 'year': date.year, 'month': date.month, 'day': date.day}))
  144. elif request.POST.get('today'):
  145. return HttpResponseRedirect(reverse('calendar_day', kwargs={
  146. 'year': now().year, 'month': now().month,
  147. 'day': now().day}))
  148. if request.is_ajax():
  149. self.template_name = 'calendarium/partials/calendar_day.html'
  150. return super(DayView, self).dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
  152. def get_context_data(self, **kwargs):
  153. occurrences = Event.objects.get_occurrences(self.date, self.date)
  154. ctx = {'date': self.date, 'occurrences': occurrences}
  155. return ctx
  158. class EventDetailView(DetailView):
  159. """View to return information of an event."""
  160. model = Event
  163. class EventMixin(object):
  164. """Mixin to handle event-related functions."""
  165. model = Event
  167. @method_decorator(permission_required('calendarium.add_event'))
  168. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  169. return super(EventMixin, self).dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)
  172. class EventUpdateView(EventMixin, UpdateView):
  173. """View to update information of an event."""
  174. pass
  177. class EventCreateView(EventMixin, CreateView):
  178. """View to create an event."""
  179. pass
  182. class EventDeleteView(EventMixin, DeleteView):
  183. """View to delete an event."""
  184. pass
  187. class OccurrenceViewMixin(object):
  188. """Mixin to avoid repeating code for the Occurrence view classes."""
  189. form_class = OccurrenceForm
  191. def dispatch(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  192. try:
  193. self.event = Event.objects.get(pk=kwargs.get('pk'))
  194. except Event.DoesNotExist:
  195. raise Http404
  196. year = int(kwargs.get('year'))
  197. month = int(kwargs.get('month'))
  198. day = int(kwargs.get('day'))
  199. try:
  200. date = datetime(year, month, day, tzinfo=utc)
  201. except TypeError:
  202. raise Http404
  203. # this should retrieve the one single occurrence, that has a
  204. # matching start date
  205. try:
  206. occ = Occurrence.objects.get(
  207. start__year=year, start__month=month, start__day=day)
  208. except Occurrence.DoesNotExist:
  209. occ_gen = self.event.get_occurrences(self.event.start)
  210. occ = occ_gen.next()
  211. while occ.start.date() < date.date():
  212. occ = occ_gen.next()
  213. if occ.start.date() == date.date():
  214. self.occurrence = occ
  215. else:
  216. raise Http404
  217. self.object = self.occurrence
  218. return super(OccurrenceViewMixin, self).dispatch(
  219. request, *args, **kwargs)
  221. def get_object(self):
  222. return self.occurrence
  224. def get_form_kwargs(self):
  225. kwargs = super(OccurrenceViewMixin, self).get_form_kwargs()
  226. kwargs.update({'initial': model_to_dict(self.occurrence)})
  227. return kwargs
  230. class OccurrenceDeleteView(OccurrenceViewMixin, DeleteView):
  231. """View to delete an occurrence of an event."""
  232. def delete(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
  233. self.object = self.get_object()
  234. decision = self.request.POST.get('decision')
  235. self.object.delete_period(decision)
  236. return HttpResponseRedirect(self.get_success_url())
  238. def get_context_data(self, object):
  239. ctx = super(OccurrenceDeleteView, self).get_context_data()
  240. ctx.update({
  241. 'decisions': OCCURRENCE_DECISIONS,
  242. 'object': self.object
  243. })
  244. return ctx
  247. class OccurrenceDetailView(OccurrenceViewMixin, DetailView):
  248. """View to show information of an occurrence of an event."""
  249. pass
  252. class OccurrenceUpdateView(OccurrenceViewMixin, UpdateView):
  253. """View to edit an occurrence of an event."""
  254. pass
